SAINT.Name: Afterfeast of the Transfiguration of the Lord
Holy Martyr Archdeacon Euplus of Catania (+304)
Venerable Martyrs Theodore and Basil of the Kiev Caves

Virginmartyr Susanna and those with her: Gaius the Pope of Rome, Gavinius the Presbyter, his brother and the father of Susanna, Maximus, Claudius, and his wife Prepedigna, and their sons Alexander and Cythius (+295-296)
Saint Theodore, Prince of Ostrog (+ c.1483)
St Néophyte, Zénon, Gaïus, Marc, Macaire et Gaïen
Commémoration de l'invention l'Icône non faite de main d'homme de notre Seigneur
Sts Anastase et Dimitrios de Lesbos
Sts Basile et Théodore des Grottes de Kiev
St Théodore (ex-prince d'Ostrog) des grottes de Kiev
Мц. Сосанны девы и с нею Гаия, папы Римского, Гавиния пресвитера, Клавдия, Максима, Препедигны, Александра и Куфия (295-296)
